channel.title: Twitter @Google AI
channel.description: Google AI is focused on bringing the benefits of AI to everyone. In conducting and applying our research, we advance the state-of-the-art in many domains. - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: Re AMIE is one way we are safely exploring a vision of the future, where AI systems might be better aligned with attributes of a skilled clinician. Fu...
item.description: Re AMIE is one way we are safely exploring a vision of the future, where AI systems might be better aligned with attributes of a skilled clinician. Further research is needed in this domain to ensure that we are building safe, equitable, helpful, and transparent #HealthAI systems.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Re In our latest work, AMIE and PCPs performed consultations with patient actors in a virtual OSCE-style study. AMIE showed it could acquire diagnosti...
item.description: Re In our latest work, AMIE and PCPs performed consultations with patient actors in a virtual OSCE-style study. AMIE showed it could acquire diagnostic information conversationally, while also displaying alignment with attributes of clinicians, like communicating with empathy.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Re In an earlier randomized, double-blind vignette study to generate a differential diagnosis on 300+ @NEJM case challenges, AMIE showed the potential...
item.description: Re In an earlier randomized, double-blind vignette study to generate a differential diagnosis on 300+ @NEJM case challenges, AMIE showed the potential to outperform primary care practitioners in diagnostic accuracy AND showed it could be a helpful collaborator to clinicians.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Re AMIE uses a novel self-play based simulated environment with automated feedback mechanisms for scaling learning across diverse disease conditions, ...
item.description: Re AMIE uses a novel self-play based simulated environment with automated feedback mechanisms for scaling learning across diverse disease conditions, specialties, and contexts.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today, we shared our latest preprint introducing AMIE (Articulate Medical Intelligence Explorer), a large language model (LLM) based research AI syste...
item.description: Today, we shared our latest preprint introducing AMIE (Articulate Medical Intelligence Explorer), a large language model (LLM) based research AI system for diagnostic medical reasoning and conversations.ðŸ”— https://goo.gle/3TZocp0

item.title: Outside of the mathematical setting, large language models can be prone to making logical mistakes. Today we present an evaluation benchmark for mista...
item.description: Outside of the mathematical setting, large language models can be prone to making logical mistakes. Today we present an evaluation benchmark for mistake identification across settings and examine how LLMs might learn to correct their own logical errors. â†’https://goo.gle/48Ox58T

item.description: Congrats to Googler @milindtambe_ai for winning the AAAI Award for Artificial Intelligence for the Benefit of Humanity, which recognizes the positive impacts of AI to protect, enhance, & improve human life in meaningful ways with long-lived effects. More â†“https://goo.gle/3RTiuSU

item.title: Areas with fewer trees are more vulnerable to climate change. Google Research launched Tree Canopy Insights on Google's Environmental Insights Explore...
item.description: Areas with fewer trees are more vulnerable to climate change. Google Research launched Tree Canopy Insights on Google's Environmental Insights Explorer (EIE) to help fight extreme heat â€” learn how itâ€™s being used in Austin, TX to tackle climate inequity â†’ https://goo.gle/3S3F5xk

item.title: For millions of people, being able to speak & be understood can be difficult. Learn how Adwoa & George are using Project Relate, a beta Android applic...
item.description: For millions of people, being able to speak & be understood can be difficult. Learn how Adwoa & George are using Project Relate, a beta Android application, to help overcome communication obstacles and use their voices for change. Watch their full story â†’ https://goo.gle/49VxmID

item.title: 2023 has been an exciting year for research across Google. Today @JeffDean, @demishassabis, and James Manyika highlight some of this year's exciting r...
item.description: 2023 has been an exciting year for research across Google. Today @JeffDean, @demishassabis, and James Manyika highlight some of this year's exciting research across #GenerativeAI, language models, quantum, health, #ResponsibleAI, and more! Check it out at https://goo.gle/3TBsyCp
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Magic Eraser now uses gen AI to fill in detail when users remove unwanted objects from photos. Google Research worked on the MaskGIT generative image ...
item.description: Magic Eraser now uses gen AI to fill in detail when users remove unwanted objects from photos. Google Research worked on the MaskGIT generative image transformer for inpainting, and improved segmentation to include shadows and objects attached to people.
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Our researchers helped develop Hold for Me, an AI-driven technology that processes audio directly on your Pixel device and can determine whether you'v...
item.description: Our researchers helped develop Hold for Me, an AI-driven technology that processes audio directly on your Pixel device and can determine whether you've been placed on hold or if someone has picked up the call. Learn more â†’ https://goo.gle/49VKv4n
item.author: Google AI

item.title: Today, hear from Tania Bedrax-Weiss, Sr. Director, Research Engineering at Google! She and her team explore how to push the state of the art in langua...
item.description: Today, hear from Tania Bedrax-Weiss, Sr. Director, Research Engineering at Google! She and her team explore how to push the state of the art in language & vision understanding and generation; their goal is to make Google products more efficient, reliable, and easy to use. More â†“

item.title: Check out our researchersâ€™ contributions to Ultra HDR, a format allowing Pixel devices to capture more lifelike images. It provides tonemapping into ...
item.description: Check out our researchersâ€™ contributions to Ultra HDR, a format allowing Pixel devices to capture more lifelike images. It provides tonemapping into a wider range of colors & brightness/contrast, enabled by the Actua & Super Actua HDR-enabled displays on the Pixel & Pixel 8 Pro.

item.title: The HausaNLP Research Group in Nigeria uses Google Colab to build next-generation datasets for Hausa & other low-resource languages. Their goal is to ...
item.description: The HausaNLP Research Group in Nigeria uses Google Colab to build next-generation datasets for Hausa & other low-resource languages. Their goal is to increase the representation of the 300+ languages spoken in Nigeria in AI training datasets. Watch more â†’https://goo.gle/3NArT09

item.title: RT Google Public Policy: In Dialogues, @Google's James Manyika, @Kent_Walker, @demishassabis, and experts from a variety of backgrounds explore some o...
item.description:
RTâ€‚Google Public Policy
In Dialogues, @Google's James Manyika, @Kent_Walker, @demishassabis, and experts from a variety of backgrounds explore some of the biggest unanswered questions about AI, society, and what comes next.

Explore the digital magazine here. https://www.theatlantic.com/sponsored/google-2023/dialogues/3841/
